trans-unit.source: Data is accessible both directly as numpy arrays
trans-unit.target: 数据可以直接以numpy数组的形式访问。

trans-unit.source: Depending on your particular application you may also want to check out striplog for stratigraphic/lithological data, and welly for dealing with data at the well level. lasio is primarily for reading & writing LAS files.
trans-unit.target: 根据您的具体应用可能还需要检查 striplog的地层/岩性数据，并 WELLY在井水平与数据处理。lasio主要用于读取和写入LAS文件。

trans-unit.target: 对于最低工作要求,你需要安装numpy。用以下方法安装lasio。

trans-unit.source: Header information is parsed into simple HeaderItem objects, and stored in a dictionary for each section of the header:
trans-unit.target: 头信息被解析成简单的HeaderItem对象,并存储在头的每个部分的字典中。

trans-unit.source: Note this is not a package for reading LiDAR data (also called "LAS files").
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这不是用于读取LiDAR数据（也称为“ LAS文件”）的软件包。

trans-unit.source: Quick start
trans-unit.target: 快速启动

trans-unit.source: Read and write Log ASCII Standard files with Python.
trans-unit.target: 用Python读取和写入日志ASCII标准文件。

trans-unit.source: Read/write well data from Log ASCII Standard (LAS) files
trans-unit.target: 从日志ASCII标准(LAS)文件中读/写井数据。

trans-unit.source: See here for the complete lasio package documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的lasio软件包文档，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: See the package documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多详细信息，请参见软件包文档。

trans-unit.source: The data is stored as a 2D numpy array:
trans-unit.target: 数据以2D numpy数组的形式存储。

trans-unit.source: This is a Python 2.7 and 3.3+ package to read and write Log ASCII Standard (LAS) files, used for borehole data such as geophysical, geological, or petrophysical logs. It's compatible with versions 1.2 and 2.0 of the LAS file specification, published by the Canadian Well Logging Society. Support for LAS 3 is being worked on. In principle it is designed to read as many types of LAS files as possible, including ones containing common errors or non-compliant formatting.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个Python 2.7和3.3+软件包，用于读取和写入Log ASCII标准（LAS）文件，用于处理井眼数据，例如地球物理，地质或岩石物理记录。它与LAS文件规范的1.2和2.0版本兼容，该规范由加拿大测井协会发布。正在为LAS 3提供支持。原则上，它旨在读取尽可能多的LAS文件类型，包括那些包含常见错误或不兼容格式的文件。

trans-unit.source: To make sure you have everything, use this to ensure pandas, cchardet, and openpyxl are also installed:
trans-unit.target: 为了确保你有所有的东西,使用这个来确保pandas、chardet和openpyxl也被安装。

trans-unit.source: You can also retrieve and load data as a pandas DataFrame, build LAS files from scratch, write them back to disc, and export to Excel, amongst other things.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以将数据作为 pandas DataFrame检索和加载，从头开始构建LAS文件，将它们写回到光盘中以及导出到Excel等。
